Criteria for Reducing Pension of a Hospitalized Veteran
Generally, the provisions of
38 CFR 3.551
require a reduction of pension payments for a Veteran who
has not established dependents for Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) purposes, and
is being furnished hospital, domiciliary or nursing home care by VA or at VA expense.
Note
:Â  A therapeutic residence is considered domiciliary care for the purposes of reduction of benefits under
38 CFR 3.551(e)
.
